# South Carolina House of Representatives District 42

## About

South Carolina House of Representatives District 42 is a state legislative district
in South Carolina. The district is located in Richland County.

## Current representative

**John H. Smith** (Republican) is the incumbent representative for this district.
He has served since 2018.

## 2026 election

### General election

The general election for South Carolina House of Representatives District 42
will take place on November 3, 2026.

### Candidates

The following candidates are running in the 2026 election:

#### Republican Party

**John H. Smith** (Republican) - incumbent

#### Democratic Party

**Jane Marie Doe** (Democratic)

**Robert A. Johnson Jr.** (Democratic)

### Primary elections

If there are multiple candidates from the same party, a primary election
will be held on June 9, 2026.

## Previous elections

### 2024 election

**John H. Smith** (Republican) ran unopposed.

### 2022 election

**John H. Smith** (Republican) defeated **Mary Williams** (Democratic)
with 58% of the vote.

## District demographics

The district has a population of approximately 45,000 residents.
